job_tasks.phrase: je bepaalt waar automatisering met AI-technologieën kan worden toegepast
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates understanding business needs to identify areas for AI automation.
This phrase directly refers to the preparation of data for AI models, a key aspect of data engineering.
Directly mentions the core activity of training AI models.
This phrase describes the design and creation of ML models.
Refers to the selection of algorithms, a critical part of model development.
Implies iterative improvement and tuning of AI systems, which falls under modeling and optimization.
Evaluating model performance is a core component of the modeling lifecycle.
This describes fine-tuning and improving models based on evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: integreert deze in bestaande systemen of applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of models into applications, a software development task.
Designing scalable solutions is a software development responsibility, especially for production systems.
Testing solutions before deployment is a crucial part of operations and deployment pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen van schaalbare oplossingen om aan toekomstige groei en veranderende eisen te kunnen voldoen
job_tasks.justification: This relates to building robust and maintainable systems for production, a key aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Je blijft altijd op de hoogte van de laatste ontwikkelingen in AI en automatisering
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to stay current with advancements in AI.

job_tasks.phrase: je draagt bij aan innovatie binnen het vakgebied
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes a proactive contribution to innovation.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met ervaren teamleden
job_tasks.justification: This points to working closely with others.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met multidisciplinaire teams
job_tasks.justification: This indicates collaboration with different types of teams.
This directly refers to the analysis of problems to find solutions.
This indicates dealing with challenging and complex projects.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met ervaren teamleden
Je werkt nauw samen met multidisciplinaire teams
Je blijft altijd op de hoogte van de laatste ontwikkelingen in AI en automatisering
je draagt bij aan innovatie binnen het vakgebied

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional ML tasks like data preparation, model design, algorithm selection, training, evaluation, and optimization. While it mentions integrating into applications, the core focus is on the ML modeling lifecycle and automation of processes using these models, aligning more closely with an ML Engineer than a GenAI Engineer.
